name: Frogger (itch) (ramtin_ehsani)
description:
Frogger Game

Remember the Frogger game?

I have developed a similar game like Frogger with better graphics and newer mechanics and features for Classic Games Remix Jam.

How To Play

You need to play using your arrow keys on your keyboard. After eating 3 apples, you can press F to use the slow-motion effect.

GitHub

https://github.com/ramtin-ehsani/Frogger-Game
